FuncDef:
The snmp-agent notify-filter-profile command creates or updates the trap filtering information, supports configuration up to 20.
The undo snmp-agent notify-filter-profile command deletes the created or updated trap filtering information. The snmp-agent notify-filter-profile command creates or updates the trap filtering information, supports configuration up to 20. The undo snmp-agent notify-filter-profile command deletes the created or updated trap filtering information. By default, no trap messages are filtered.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the filter type.
excluded: Excludes the MIB subtree.included: Includes the MIB subtree.

Specifies a profile name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters, spaces not supported.
When quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the object subtree name, that is, the OID value of a MIB object.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 numeric characters, in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: To filter trap messages sent to a target host, run the snmp-agent notify-filter-profile command to add the MIB objects to be filtered to a filter profile to limit the number of MIB objects that can send trap messages to the NMS. After the filter profile is configured using the snmp-agent notify-filter-profile command, only the trap messages generated by eligible MIB objects are sent to the NMS.
